EmailTemplate.subject: An update on your NCS application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
An update on your application to NCS with The Challenge
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
You are still on a waiting list for NCS with The Challenge.
Do you have exams, proms, work experience or holidays coming up?
If your availability has changed, then let us know - you can update your availability online by logging into your account. Please choose as many dates as possible that you might be free for, so you have the best possible chance of getting a place this year.
If you have forgotten your password, you can recover it here.
Places on the programme can become available throughout the summer so we hope to give you more news soon.
Do you want to learn some amazing NCS cooking skills?? Don’t forget to like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter to keep up with what's happening.
Good luck for any exams coming up – check out our #NCSRevisionTip of the day.
The Challenge Team
